name: Disruptor Beam Dark
description: A theme for the Disruptor Beam forums for those that prefer something other than the traditional white and blue that is offered.  Please note: tested and used in Firefox, it has NOT been tested in Chrome as of yet.

user.name: Sena Re
user.about: I'm just learning CSS and have started creating themes more because I couldn't find what I was looking for.  Any tips and tricks would be welcome!
